strong.span: FREE MILK FOR RESIDENT FAMILIES ON APRIL 10, 2020:

Dairy Farmers of America, a national milk cooperative, reached out to ADANE and arranged for a truck load of milk containing 20 pallets of milk to go to the Corinth Elementary School campus parking lot (356 Center Street) on Friday, April 10. Dr. Stratton urges families in the Corinth and Hadley-Luzerne communities to pick up the free milk between 9 am and 12 pm while supplies last. a.span: HLCS ESSA Parent Letter - From Superintendent Baker

p.strong: The HLCSD Parent Portal / Family Link is in transition as we switch to a new Student Management System. We hope to have it up by the end of the year.

em.em: Welcome to Hadley Luzerne Central School District

Our mission is to foster a positive, safe, and healthy environment that will enable every student to achieve their highest potential. The district will partner with parents and community to empower students, celebrate in their successes, and support them along their educational journey.
